name: Zork (Hebdogiciel)
overview: Not to be confused with the more famous adventure game/series from Infocom, Zork from Hebdogiciel is a French language single-screen platformer for the Commodore 64. It was developed by Gilles Deroo and published in Hebdogiciel N°054 (26.10.1984). You are Zork, a kind of insect and, like all bugs your given vocation is to repair computers and, more particularly ZORK, the mad computer which sabotages the others...
